Angelina Jolie has never even met the four-year-old Haitian orphan called Emily Blunt , who British and other newspapers claim she is in the process of adopting, Waldman told The Daily Beast. Earlier this week, the Daily Mirror U.K. and others reported that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are in the process of adopting a child from Haiti, Waldman said in a statement.`` There is no truth to these rumors.`` Rather, Ms. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Larry Page said:`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
